publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-866 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designation of Committee—That the Parliament agrees that the Finance Committee considers the Protection of Wild Mammals (Scotland) Bill and reports on the provisions referred to in Rule 9.12.2 and 9.12.3 and that Rule 9.12.5 and Rule 9.12.6 of the standing orders be suspended for the purpose of the Parliament’s consideration of the Bill.
